Title: ContextMenu Manager
Description: ContextMenu Manager is a .NET class library (dll) that can manage editable control's (like textbox, combobox, numericupdown, ...) ContextMenu and relate it's item (Copy, Cut, Paste, ...) to toolstripitem or menustripitem.

Project name : ContextMenu Manager
Platform : Microsoft .NET framework 2.0 (Visual Studio 2005)

Project Description
ContextMenu Manager is a .NET class library (dll) that can manage editable control's (like textbox, combobox, numericupdown, ...) ContextMenu and relate it's item (Copy, Cut, Paste, ...) to toolstripitem or menustripitem.
